adjective.description: Focusing one's awareness on the present moment, especially as part of a therapeutic or meditative technique.
examples: tune in to your body and be mindful
a mindful approach to life helps us to let go of the stress that often comes with conflicts in relationships

adjective.description: Inclined or willing to do something.
examples: the judge said that he was not mindful to postpone the eviction again
